Title: Relates to applying a special Medicaid rate for certain residential health care facilities
Summary: Applies a special Medicaid rate of no less than one hundred twenty percent of the fee-for-service rate for residential health care facilities located in a county larger than two thousand square miles and operated by an organization with two hundred fifty certified beds or more.
LawCode: Amd ยง2808, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to applying a special Medicaid rate for certain residential health care facilities
